remarks: Adding both sides of two 'less than' relations.  Theorem I.25 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Aug-1999.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement: lt2add $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( C e. RR /\ D e. RR ) ) -> ( ( A < C /\ B < D ) -> ( A + B ) < ( C + D ) ) ) $.
